body:
You might as well sell your JNJ for ARKG

And sell your BOTZ and ROBO for ARKQ

And sell your BABA and V for more ARKW

And then sell your KODK for ARKK for that bitcoin exposure

ARKK bought 116,537 shares of CRSP at 3:00 PM

ARKG bought 9,389 shares of CRSP at 3:00 PM

I’d be cool with them selling near 310 since hey are taking on more risk.

I’m just peeved that they bought into tesla In their ARKW fund. Keep it in ARKK. I’d rather see a fatter stake in SaaS companies and Microsoft in ARKW.

Still outperforming QQQ YTD.

SPY 7%
QQQ 13%
ARKK 14%
ARKW 16%.



Wait till earnings season to see if their convictions are correct. I currently have no positions TSLA but thought this was interesting.
ARKK is one of the better performing ETFs man.  They’re crazy and probably the biggest Tesla bulls you can find.
These twats sold Apple and amazon and nvidia to go in more on TSLA. I’m so annoyed. I though ARKW was the web based one, keep tesla for ARKK
Their recent trade of SSYS was just in time for a 15% jump after earnings. I have about half of my retirement portfolio in ARKK and am comfortable with them doing the work for me.
